name: SideStore [un]Offical
subtitle: The Ideal Source
description: The rules don't follow if the rules follow blindly.

apps.name: BHTwitter
apps.subtitle: Awesome tweak for Twitter.
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:

• Download Videos (even if account private).
• Replay later feature.
• Video zoom feature.
• No history feature.
• Hide topics tweet feature.
• Disable video layer caption.
• Padlock.
• Font changer.
• Auto load photos in highest quality feature
• Undo tweet feature.
• Reader mode feature.
• Disable new tweet style (A.K.A edge to edge tweet)
• Enable voice tweet and voice message in DM.
• Hide promoted tweet from the timeline.
• Confirm alert when hit the tweet button.
• Confirm alert when hit like button.
• FLEX for debugging.

• And more!

versions.versionDescription:
• Fix crashing in downloading longer video and freezing using FFmpeg.
• New option to hide bookmark button.

versions.name: ShowMania
versions.subtitle: Another awesome app.
versions.localizedDescription: This is another awesome app only available on AltStore.
No ads but couldn’t remove the tracking so click don’t allowed.-O3C
